mapper.update:
update blog_subject
blogSubjectId = #{blogSubjectId}, subjectTitle = #{subjectTitle}, blogTypeId = #{blogTypeId}, where 1 = 1 and blogSubjectId = #{blogSubjectId} ${condition}
mapper.delete: delete from blog_subject where blogSubjectId in (${ids})
mapper.select: select a.* from blog_subject a LEFT JOIN blog_type b on a.blogTypeId = b.blogTypeId where 1 = 1 and b.parentString like '%;${blogTypeId};%' or b.blogTypeId = #{blogTypeId} limit #{startPage},#{page}
